Requirements: 
- ImageMagick needs to be installed in computer (https://imagemagick.org/index.php)
- Need to run Suitability.Rmd

```{r}
# Load required packages
library(magick)
```


```{r}
# set working directory to gif folder
setwd("gif")

# png of EEZ

# png of depth
png(file="depth_binary_graph.png")
  depth_binary_graph
dev.off()

  sst_binary_min_graph
dev.off()

# png of max sst

dist_shore_binary_graph

# png of dissolved oxygrn
png(file="DO_min_binary_graph.png")
DO_min_binary_graph

# png overlay of all layers
png(file="all_layers_graph.png")
all_layers_graph

# convert the .png files to one .gif file using ImageMagicK
system("convert -delay 80 *.png binary_layers.gif")

# Remove png files
file.remove(list.files(pattern=".png"))
```
